column2:
"prediction": "President Muhammadu Buhari has announced several measures to contain the spread of COVID-19 in Nigeria. These include:

1. Establishing a National Centre for Disease Control (NCDC) to coordinate the response to the pandemic.
2. Implementing strict travel restrictions and quarantine measures for those arriving from countries affected by the virus.
3. Providing financial support to states and local governments to help them respond to"}
